title: Provided further that, it shall be permissible to utilise the FSI and also the receiving potential of the land under this zone, on the remaining contiguous unaffected land of the same land owner
clause_text: Provided further that, it shall be permissible to utilise the FSI and also the receiving potential of the land under this zone, on the remaining contiguous unaffected land of the same land owner.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
